about.title: About
about.about:
# About

This is about the Global Landslide/Floods Monitoring System
This was a lot of work and we need your help

## How Can I Help?

Signin and start entering data

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.privacy:
# PRIVACY STATEMENT

We respect your privacy!

It is our policy not to share or sell any information you provide us.

## Your Information

Our Web site may contain several contact forms and links that allow visitors to interact with our system. 
These may require personal information so that we can respond to requests efficiently, especially if the response entails the use of U.S. mail or another courier.
We may also use that information to measure the societal benefits of the provided science data.
The information we collect is used only to respond to specific requests. We may retain this information but do not use it for any other purpose.

## Cookies

Periodically we may use cookies to collect non personally identifiable information. 
This helps us detect things such as browser type and plugins, and navigational information regarding which pages visitors go to and when. 
The information we collect through cookies is used only to respond to specific requests. We may retain this information but do not use it for any other purpose.

If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us by email, mail, phone, or fax.

terms.title: Terms
terms.terms:
# Terms of Service Agreement

Welcome to the Multi-Scale, Multi-Hazard Architecture for Disasters and Science (MMADS)!
Before you get started with this valuable tool for environmental hazard professionals and the general public, it is necessary that you understand and agree to the preconditions of use associated with this site. 
Therefore, please read this page in its entirety. 
Please note that by using or accessing this site in any way, whether viewing or adding your own content, you are agreeing to be bound by these Terms of Service.

# PRIVACY

The Multi-Scale, Multi-Hazard Architecture for Disasters and Science (MMADS) is an official U.S. Government website, and, as such, provides its users no expectation of privacy.  
Whatever you put up on this site will be available for everyone who is part of the community to see and so you must exercise caution in what you post. 
Any material that is classified, defamatory, obscene, proprietary or libelous is strictly forbidden.

# OUR SERVICES

+ NASA/GSFC acts only as a hosting service, maintaining the organizational framework that allows our users to communicate and share ideas by contributing and editing content themselves. NASA/GSFC generally does not monitor or edit the content posted, and we do not take any responsibility for this content. Further, we do not endorse any opinions expressed via our services, and we do not represent or guarantee the truthfulness, accuracy, or reliability of any submitted community content. Instead, we simply provide access to the content that your fellow users have contributed and edited.
+ You are legally responsible for your edits and contributions on MMADS, so you should exercise caution and avoid contributing any content that may result in criminal or civil liability under any applicable laws.

# REFRAINING FROM CERTAIN ACTIVITIES

1. To ensure the integrity of this site, data repositories and scientific content, the following activities are not allowed:
   + Advertisement or offer to sell or buy any goods or services.  This includes use of this site in connection with owning, operating, or participating in a private business.
   + Provision of links to files that contain viruses, Trojan horses, worms, time bombs, cancelbots, corrupted files or any similar software or programs that may damage the operation of another computer or another’s property.
   + Falsification or deletion of any copyright management information, such as author attributions, legal or other proper notices, or proprietary designations or labels of origin or source of material contained in a file that is uploaded.
   + Infringing copyrights, trademarks, patents, or other proprietary rights under applicable law. 
   + Creation of a false identity or provision of false information for the purpose of misleading others.
   + Bullying, intimidating, hateful, violent or harassing behavior.
   + Discrimination in any form, including discrimination as to race, religion, gender, sexual preference, age, national origin and disability; and
   + Using the services of this website in a manner that is inconsistent with applicable law.

2.	The rights of others are to be respected by users at all times. Toward this end: 
   + Disparaging remarks towards others are not allowed.  Disagreements and differences of opinion are fine and to be expected, but personal attacks are prohibited. 
   + NASA/GSFC can remove any content or link posted on this site that, in the discretion of the managers of this content, violates these terms of service.
   + Any violation of these terms of service is grounds for the disablement of a user’s account.
   + Any violation of these terms of service of which a user becomes aware must be reported immediately to the managers of this website using the “Report This” feature located at the bottom of each page.
   + Check facts as far as reasonably possible before posting.  Accurate information and content are vital to a constructive exchange of ideas.
   + User represents warrants that the user has the right to, or otherwise has secured the necessary permission to, contribute any materials, content data or other information on this website. 


# TERMINATION

NASA/GSFC reserves the right to terminate a user’s access to the site, without any advance notice.

# THIRD PARTY WEBSITES AND RESOURCES

Our site contains a number of links to other websites and online resources that are not owned or controlled by NASA/GSFC. NASA/GSFC has no control over, and therefore cannot assume responsibility for the content or general practices of any of these third party sites and/or services. Therefore, we strongly advise you to read the entire terms and conditions and privacy policy of any site that you visit as a result of following a link that is posted on our site.
NASA/GSFC is not responsible for the content, data, or actions of third parties, and you release the agency, its directors, officers, employees, and agents from any claims and damages, known and unknown, arising out of or in any way connected with any claim you have against any such third parties.

# DISCLAIMER DATA/CONTENT

DATA/CONTENT, goods, services, or any information available through this web site are provided "as is."  NASA makes no express or implied warranty as to the condition of any such data/content, goods, services, or as to the merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose of such Content/Data or other information, or resulting product or derivative work, or that the data/content or other information available will accomplish any intended results or are safe for any purpose including the intended purpose, or that any of the above will not interfere with privately-owned rights of others.  Neither the government nor its contractors shall be liable for special, consequential or incidental damages attributed to any content/data or other information available through this website, or derivate works or resulting products made or developed with the ise of data/content or other information available on this website. 

# GOVERNING LAW

The laws of the United States of America will govern these Terms of Use.

# NAMES/ENDORSEMENT

The NASA name and insignia are governed by regulation.  14 C.F.R. § 1221.110  Use of "National Aeronautics and Space Administration", "NASA", or the NASA insignia in a way that creates the impression that any product or service has the authorization, support, sponsorship, or endorsement of NASA, which does not, in fact, exist is strictly prohibited. NASA does not endorse or sponsor any commercial product, service, or activity.  NASA's participation with this website or provision of any content/data or other information does not constitute endorsement by NASA.  USER agrees that no content/data or other information available on this website will be used in such a way to be construed to imply that NASA authorizes, supports, endorses, or sponsors any product or service of User resulting from activities through this website

copyrights.title: Copyrights and License
copyrights.contents: # Terms of Use The Global Landslide/Flood Catalog is open data, licensed under the Open Data Commons Open Database License (ODbL). You are free to copy, distribute, transmit and adapt our data, as long as you credit OpenStreetMap and its contributors. If you alter or build upon our data, you may distribute the result only under the same licence. The full legal code explains your rights and responsibilities. # How to credit Global Landslide/Flood Catalog We require that you use the credit “© GLFC contributors”. You must also make it clear that the data is available under the Open Database License. You may do this by linking to this copyright page. Alternatively, and as a requirement if you are distributing any data, you can name and link directly to the license(s). In media where links are not possible (e.g. printed works), we suggest you direct your readers to the website. # Our contributors Dalia Kirschbaum
